system.description: These creatures are thought to originally be from another world. Now a rarely seen species, these people are sturdy and aren't the brightest as they never know when to leave.
system.appearance: Baroosh look like @L[Creature:Halfling]{halflings} with a @L[Creature:Dwarf]{dwarf's} build and a pig-like nose.

overview.proficient: You instead climb at @L[Core:Movement Speed]{normal speed}.
